img.alt: Wave design in maroons and gold with the letters

div.em: THE IMPORTANCE OF MAINTAINING SOCIAL DISTANCING

div.div:
I'd like to take this moment to provide you with a few important updates. First, I want to thank all of you for the broad level of support during my transition into this role. I am sincerely grateful to have joined such a strong community.
Second, we will be observing April vacation from April 20-24th, which means that your child will not be receiving daily activities from their teachers during that period. However, if you are looking for enrichment activities for that week, please refer to the Distance Learning page of our website to access any of our weekly calendars, which outline activities for all subject areas by grade level.

div.br: Finally, as we approach the onset of warmer weather, I cannot stress enough how important it is for our students to be practicing social distancing, which is critical to curbing the spread of COVID-19. We ask that you, as parents and guardians, encourage your children to fulfill their collective obligation to social distance. In a time when many things seem out of our hands, social distancing is something we can control, and it provides us with an opportunity to save lives.
We hope you and your family stay safe and healthy.
